description: A React-like component definition for a Sidebar UI element, using a LightningJS-like framework. The file defines a Sidebar component with properties, template markup, state, computed properties, and methods for handling notes, search, and selection interactions.

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: A UI component representing navigation and notes management sidebar, handling search, note creation, selection, and display of notes with dynamic styling.

methods.name: $formatTitle
methods.description: Truncates the note title to a maximum of 32 characters for display.

methods.name: $formatPreview
methods.description: Truncates note content preview to 40 characters for display.

methods.name: $titleColor
methods.description: Returns color based on whether the note is active.

methods.name: $newNote
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new note.
